help: How can I help you today ? Type a command like "I want to lose 5kg" or "I want new shoes".
presentation: I’m Nadia your fitness assistant. I will help you during your training. I can find the right program for your goal, find a sport center around you and even help you finding the right equipment or sport buddy.
weightt: Ok ! Could you give me your weight
overweight: but I can still help you :wink: ! I will folow you during the process don’t worry mate.
askfrequency: How often would you like to work out?
minute: How long do you want to work out ?
questionsatisfied: Are you satisfied with this list ?
thanks: I’m glad I have helped you.
anythingelse: Can I do anything else for you ?
outfit: Of course ! Here is some good outfit for your training. Hope you’ll find something that suits you.
end: If you need any help don’t be shy, just ask. I’m here to help you. If you do it right you’ll be happy of what you'll see in the mirror
